column2: # rooted_ref_tree = ape::read.tree("/Users/rebeccachristensen/Desktop/Cremer_Lab_2022/main/workflow/out/raxmlOutputFinal/RAxML_originalLabelledTree_noBootstrap.newick")
# # # only keep tips that have hits
# hits_list <- as.vector(otu_hits_table$Var1)
hits_only_tree <- keep.tip(rooted_ref_tree, c(hits_list, ox_bact_node, nitrospirae, red_arch_node))
# hits_only_tree <- ggtree(hits_only_tree) + geom_tiplab(aes(subset=(label %in% otus_to_label)), size = 2) + xlim_tree(15)
# hits_only_tree <- ggtree(hits_only_tree) + geom_tiplab(aes(subset=(grepl("Desulfovibrio", label)) == TRUE), size = 2) + xlim_tree(15)
hits_only_tree <- ggtree(hits_only_tree, color = "dark gray") + xlim_tree(10)
tree <- hits_only_tree %>%
# collapse and label oxidative bacterial node
collapse(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, ox_bact_node)) %>%
collapse(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, red_arch_node)) %>%
collapse(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, nitrospirae)) +
# outgroup labels
geom_point2(aes(subset=(node == MRCA(hits_only_tree, ox_bact_node))), shape = 21, fill = "dark gray", color = "dark gray") +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, ox_bact_node), label = "oxidative bacterial type dsrAB", fontsize = 2, color = "dark gray") +
geom_point2(aes(subset=(node == MRCA(hits_only_tree, nitrospirae))), shape = 21, fill = "dark gray", color = "dark gray") +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, nitrospirae), label = "nitrospirae supercluster", fontsize = 2, color = "dark gray") +
geom_point2(aes(subset=(node == MRCA(hits_only_tree, red_arch_node))), shape = 21, fill = "dark gray", color = "dark gray") +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, red_arch_node), label = "reductive archaeal type dsrAB", fontsize = 2, color = "dark gray") +
# geom_point2(aes(subset=(node == MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Moorella_thermoacetica_Y72_copy_2__MooTher5"))), shape = 21, fill = "dark gray", color = "dark gray") +
# geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Moorella_thermoacetica_Y72_copy_2__MooTher5"), label = "Moorella thermoacetica, dsrAB copy 2", fontsize = 2, offset.text = 0.3, color = "dark gray") +
# species labels
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, bilophila_node), label = "Bilophila", fontsize = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, dpiger_node), label = "D. piger", fontsize = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, dalkalitolerans_node), label = "Desulfitibacter alkalitolerans", fontsize = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, gpam_node), label = "Gordonibacter pamelaeae", fontsize = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, dvulgaris_node), label = "D. vulgaris", fontsize = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, dcarboniphilus_node), label = "D. carboniphilus", fontsize = 2) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, tnarugense_node), label = "Thermodesulfobium narugense", fontsize = 2) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, archaeoglobus_node), label = "Archaeoglobus sulfaticallidus", fontsize = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, desulfitobacterium_node), label = "Desulfitobacterium", fontsize = 2) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Desulfovibrio_simplex__DslSimpl"), label = "D. simplex", fontsize = 2) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Candidatus_Desulfovibrio_trichonymphae"), label = "Candidatus D. trichonymphae", fontsize = 2) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Desulfosporosinus_youngiae__DfpYoun5"), label = "Desulfosporosinus youngiae", fontsize = 2) +
# Desulfovibrio desulfuricans labels
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Desulfovibrio_desulfuricans__DQ092635"), label = "D. desulfuricans", fontsize = 2) +

geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, c("Desulfovibrio_desulfuricans__DslDes17", "Desulfovibrio_desulfuricans_subsp._desulfuricans_str._ATCC_27774__CP001358")), label = "D. desulfuricans", fontsize = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Desulfovibrio_desulfuricans__DslDes16_DsvAlas8"), label = "D. desulfuricans", fontsize = 2) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, "Desulfovibrio_desulfuricans__DslDes24"), label = "D. desulfuricans", fontsize = 2) +
# group labels
# geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, firmicutes_node), label = "Firmicutes group sensu lato", fontsize = 4, offset = 3) +
# geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, desulfovibrionaceae_node), label = "Desulfovibrionaceae", fontsize = 4, offset = 2)
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, firmicutes_node), label = "", fontsize = 4, offset = 3) +
geom_cladelabel(node = MRCA(hits_only_tree, desulfovibrionaceae_node), label = "", fontsize = 4, offset = 2)
tree %<+%
otu_all_table +
geom_point2(aes(color = updated_freq, subset = Freq > 0)) +
scale_color_gradient(low = "blue", high = "orange") +
# guides(color = "none") +
theme(legend.position = "left")
